rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. We could accept a petition calling on the Government to make time in the UK on a Graduate Visa available to international students who want to stay in the UK after their studies) count towards settlement, but it's not clear what changes you want to be made to taxes or other fees.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
